6.7.5 Optional methods for compound document servers

OLE-part-command-window

G.f. method

Summary

Return the window handle to which command messages will be directed when any items from the inserted menus are invoked.

Signature

OLE-part-command-window obj => window :: <HWND>

Arguments

obj
An instance of your subclass of <ole-server-framework> or <ole-in-process-server>.

Values

window
An instance of <HWND>.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Return the window handle to which command messages will be directed when any items from the inserted menus are invoked.

The default method uses the document window; you will need to provide an override method if the menu commands are to be processed by the frame window.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
